attributes.action: to produce along with the department of health a leaflet for pregnant ladies outlining the dangers of Parvovirus( Slapped Cheek Syndrome) to unborn babies .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a Mother of 8 children my 8th being my little girl Violet who sleeps with the angels . She caught this terrible disease when i was 26 weeks pregant and as a result of this was stillborn on the 5th October 2008. By us signing this petition i am hopeng the goverment step up and agree with us that a seperate information leaflet on this disease should be made available to all pregnant ladies at there booking appointment to stop another family going through the heartache of loseing a baby .
